{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$87.6K in 2020-2021 on contracts with REDI FORM CONSTRUCTION.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [REDI-FORM CONSTRUCTION LTD.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22REDI-FORM%20CONSTRUCTION%20LTD.%22)
- [REDI FORM CONSTRUCTION LTD](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22REDI%20FORM%20CONSTRUCTION%20LTD%22)
{{< /details >}}
